## randomString() function

Generates a random string of characters both upper and lowercase with numbers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function randomString(size: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | number | Length of the string. Can not be null. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
